Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package moby-containerd-cc for versions less than 1.7.1-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package moby-containerd-cc for versions less than 1.7.1-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-containerd-cc is earlier than 1.7.1-5, affected by CVE-2023-44487
